Package uno.anahata.asi.status

package uno.anahata.asi.status
Provides classes for managing and broadcasting chat status events.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    uno.anahata.asi
    The core package of the Anahata AI framework, containing the central orchestrator and configuration classes.
  • Class
    Description
    ApiErrorRecord
    A record of a single API error, including context for retries.
    ChatStatus
    Defines the possible operational states of the Chat, primarily for UI feedback.
    StatusManager
    Manages and broadcasts the real-time status of the chat session.
